content.question: A windmill is spinning because of the nonuniform force of the wind. The windmill is originally spinning at a speed of <math alttext="omega sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><msub><mstyle mathvariant="italic"><mrow><mi>ω</mi></mrow></mstyle><mrow><mi>o</mi></mrow></msub><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace></mrow></mstyle></math>, and a crosswind slows it with an angular acceleration of <math alttext="negative A times omega squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mo>−</mo><mstyle mathvariant="italic"><mi>A</mi></mstyle><msup><mstyle mathvariant="italic"><mrow><mi>ω</mi></mrow></mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>. What will be the angular speed of the windmill at time <math alttext="lowercase t equals uppercase T" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="italic"><mi>t</mi></mstyle><mo>=</mo><mstyle mathvariant="italic"><mi>T</mi></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator omega sub 0, and denominator 1 plus A times uppercase T, times omega sub 0, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>ω</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>A</mi><mi>T</mi><msub><mrow><mi>ω</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="omega sub 0 times e raised to the power negative A times uppercase T, end power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>ω</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>o</mi></mrow></msub><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>A</mi><mi>T</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="omega sub 0 times, open parenthesis, 1 minus e raised to the power negative A times uppercase T, end power, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>ω</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>o</mi></mrow></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>A</mi></mrow><mi>T</mi></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="omega sub 0 plus, A times uppercase T" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>ω</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>o</mi></mrow></msub><mo>+</mo><mi>A</mi><mi>T</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="omega sub 0 minus A, times omega squared, times uppercase T" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>ω</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>o</mi></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><mi>A</mi><msup><mrow><mi>ω</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>T</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator omega sub 0, and denominator 1 plus A times uppercase T, times omega sub 0, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>ω</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>A</mi><mi>T</mi><msub><mrow><mi>ω</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
